referredBy.description: The UID of the user who referred this user.

status.description: The status of the user's account.

upiId.description: The user's saved UPI ID for withdrawals.

depositRequest.title: Deposit Request
depositRequest.description: A request to deposit funds into a user's wallet.

userId.description: The ID of the user making the request.

userName.description: The name of the user making the request.

utr.description: The Unique Transaction Reference number for the deposit.

status.description: The status of the deposit request.

createdAt.description: The time the request was created.

withdrawalRequest.title: Withdrawal Request
withdrawalRequest.description: A request to withdraw funds from a user's wallet.

userId.description: The ID of the user making the request.

userName.description: The name of the user making the request.

upiId.description: The UPI ID to send the funds to.

status.description: The status of the withdrawal request.

createdAt.description: The time the request was created.

investment.title: Investment
investment.description: Represents a user's investment in a plan.

userId.description: The ID of the user who made the investment.

planName.description: The name of the investment plan.

dailyIncome.description: The daily income from the investment.

totalReturn.description: The total return from the investment (investment + profit).

startDate.description: The start date of the investment.

endDate.description: The end date of the investment.

lastIncomeDate.description: The last date the daily income was automatically credited.

investmentPlan.title: Investment Plan
investmentPlan.description: Defines a template for an investment plan that can be purchased by users.

name.description: The name of the investment plan.

investmentAmount.description: The cost to purchase this plan.

profit.description: The daily profit from the investment.

duration.description: The duration of the investment in days.

status.description: The availability status of the plan.

adminSettings.title: Admin Settings
adminSettings.description: Stores admin-specific settings for the application.

upiId.description: The UPI ID for receiving payments.

upiQrCodeUrl.description: The URL for the UPI QR code image.

signupBonus.description: Bonus amount for a new user signing up with a referral code.

broadcastMessage.description: A message to be broadcast to all users on their dashboard.
